WorkItem.Description:
Hi guys , I am trying to bind a WPF DataGrid's ItemsSource to a DataTable. And the DataTable contains columns with names like "01/14/10" , then the data in these columns don't show up in the DataGrid Cells. Any idea what's going on here ?

Thanks

Comments.Message: Yes, I have  the same problem, if the column name including these: "/" "." " " , it ca not show up the data.
